trans-unit.source: Represents a geographical location that is determined by latitude and longitude coordinates.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta una posizione geografica che viene determinata dal latitudine e longitudine coordinate.

trans-unit.source: May also include altitude, accuracy, speed, and course information.
trans-unit.target: Può inoltre includere altitudine, accuratezza, velocità e le informazioni sul corso.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> that has no data fields set.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> che non dispone di alcun campo di dati impostato.

trans-unit.source: All data fields are set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Tutti i campi dati vengono impostati <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN>

trans-unit.source: The new instance of <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> is equivalent to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: La nuova istanza di <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>è equivalente a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: This constructor should be used for serialization.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore deve essere utilizzato per la serializzazione.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> class from latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> classe dai dati di latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: I valori di latitudine e longitudine devono corrispondere a un percorso effettivo del mondo.

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: La latitudine della posizione.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Può variare da-90.0 a 90.0.

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: La longitudine della località.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: Può variare da-180.0 a 180.0.

trans-unit.source: Latitude or longitude is out of range.
trans-unit.target: Longitudine o latitudine non compreso nell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> class from latitude, longitude, and altitude data.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> classe dai dati altitudine, longitudine e latitudine.

trans-unit.source: The latitude and longitude values must correspond to an actual location on the globe.
trans-unit.target: I valori di latitudine e longitudine devono corrispondere a un percorso effettivo del mondo.

trans-unit.source: Latitude.
trans-unit.target: Latitudine.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Può variare da-90.0 a 90.0.

trans-unit.source: Longitude.
trans-unit.target: Longitudine.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0
trans-unit.target: Può variare da-180.0 a 180.0

trans-unit.source: The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: Altitudine in metri.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <xref:System.Double>, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Può essere negativo, 0, positivo o <xref:System.Double>, se sconosciuto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: latitude, longitude, or altitude is out of range.
trans-unit.target: latitude, longitude, o altitude non compreso nell'intervallo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> class from latitude, longitude, altitude, horizontal accuracy, vertical accuracy, speed, and course.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> classe da latitudine, longitudine, altitudine, accuratezza orizzontale, verticale accuratezza, velocità e corso.

trans-unit.source: The latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: La latitudine della posizione.

trans-unit.source: May range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Può variare da-90.0 a 90.0.

trans-unit.source: The longitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: La longitudine della località.

trans-unit.source: May range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: Può variare da-180.0 a 180.0.

trans-unit.source: The altitude in meters.
trans-unit.target: Altitudine in metri.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <xref:System.Double>, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Può essere negativo, 0, positivo o <xref:System.Double>, se sconosciuto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: L'accuratezza delle coordinate di latitudine e longitudine, in metri.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Deve essere maggiore o uguale a 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy*> property will be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore 0 viene fornito a questo costruttore, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy*>verrà impostata su <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy*>

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: L'accuratezza dell'altitudine, in metri.

trans-unit.source: Must be greater than or equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: Deve essere maggiore o uguale a 0.

trans-unit.source: If a value of 0 is supplied to this constructor, the <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy*> property will be set to <xref:System.Double.NaN>.
trans-unit.target: Se il valore 0 viene fornito a questo costruttore, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy*>verrà impostata su <xref:System.Double.NaN>.</xref:System.Double.NaN> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy*>

trans-unit.source: The speed measured in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: La velocità è misurata in metri al secondo.

trans-unit.source: May be negative, 0, positive, or <xref:System.Double>, if unknown.
trans-unit.target: Può essere negativo, 0, positivo o <xref:System.Double>, se sconosciuto.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: A negative speed can indicate moving in reverse.
trans-unit.target: Può indicare una velocità negativa lo spostamento in senso inverso.

trans-unit.source: The direction of travel, rather than orientation.
trans-unit.target: La direzione di spostamento, anziché l'orientamento.

trans-unit.source: This parameter is measured in degrees relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Questo parametro viene misurato in gradi rispetto al vero nord.

trans-unit.source: Must range from 0 to 360.0, or be <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: Deve essere compreso tra 0 e 360,0 o essere <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: latitude, longitude, horizontalAccuracy, verticalAccuracy, or course is out of range.
trans-unit.target: latitude, longitude, horizontalAccuracy, verticalAccuracy, or course is out of range.

trans-unit.source: Gets the altitude of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene l'altitudine del <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, in metri.

trans-unit.source: The altitude is given relative to sea level.
trans-unit.target: L'Altitudine ha rispetto al livello di mare.

trans-unit.source: The altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Altitudine, in metri.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'intestazione in gradi, rispetto al vero nord.

trans-unit.source: The valid range includes values from 0.0 to 360.0, and `Double.NaN` if the heading is not defined.
trans-unit.target: L'intervallo valido include valori compresi tra 0,0 e 360,0 e `Double.NaN` se l'intestazione non è definito.

trans-unit.source: The heading in degrees, relative to true north.
trans-unit.target: Intestazione in gradi, rispetto al vero nord.

trans-unit.source: Course is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: Corso è compreso nell'intervallo valido.

trans-unit.source: Determines if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> object is equivalent to the parameter, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetto è equivalente al parametro, basato esclusivamente su latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>oggetti hanno lo stesso <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>proprietà non vengono utilizzate per determinare l'equivalenza.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> object to compare to the calling object.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetto da confrontare con l'oggetto chiamante.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetti sono uguali; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines if a specified <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, based solely on latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Determina se un oggetto specificato <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> è uguale all'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, basata esclusivamente su latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>oggetti hanno lo stesso <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>proprietà non vengono utilizzate per determinare l'equivalenza.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The object to compare the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da confrontare con il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> per.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are equal; otherwise,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetti sono uguali; in caso contrario,<xref uid="langword_csharp_ false" name=" false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns the distance between the latitude and longitude coordinates that are specified by this <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> and another specified <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce la distanza tra le coordinate di latitudine e longitudine specificati da questo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> e un altro oggetto <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula is used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: La formula Haversine viene utilizzata per calcolare la distanza.

trans-unit.source: The Haversine formula accounts for the curvature of the earth, but assumes a spherical earth rather than an ellipsoid.
trans-unit.target: La formula Haversine la curvatura della terra, ma si presuppone una terra sferica piuttosto che come un ellissoide.

trans-unit.source: For long distances, the Haversine formula introduces an error of less than 0.1 percent.
trans-unit.target: Per distanze, la formula Haversine introduce un errore di minore di 0,1 percento.

trans-unit.source: Altitude is not used to calculate the distance.
trans-unit.target: Altitudine, non viene usato per calcolare la distanza.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> for the location to calculate the distance to.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> del percorso calcolare la distanza.

trans-unit.source: The distance between the two coordinates, in meters.
trans-unit.target: La distanza tra le due coordinate, in metri.

trans-unit.source: Serves as a hash function for the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Funge da funzione hash per il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects that are equivalent have the same hash code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>gli oggetti che sono equivalenti avere lo stesso codice hash.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>oggetti hanno lo stesso <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>proprietà non vengono utilizzate per determinare l'equivalenza.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Codice hash per l'oggetto corrente <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the latitude and longitude that is given by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'accuratezza della latitudine e longitudine fornito dal <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, in metri.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy can be considered the radius of certainty of the latitude and longitude data.
trans-unit.target: L'accuratezza può essere considerata il raggio di certezza da parte dei dati di latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: A circular area that is formed with the accuracy as the radius and the latitude and longitude coordinates as the center contains the actual location.
trans-unit.target: Un'area circolare formata con l'accuratezza delle coordinate di radius e la latitudine e longitudine come centro contiene il percorso effettivo.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: L'accuratezza della latitudine e longitudine, in metri.

trans-unit.source: HorizontalAccuracy is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: HorizontalAccuracy è compreso nell'intervallo valido.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> does not contain latitude or longitude data.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene un valore che indica se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> non contiene dati di longitudine o latitudine.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> that does not contain latitude or longitude data is equal to <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>che non contengono latitudine o dati relativi alla longitudine sono uguali a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown>.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Unknown> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> does not contain latitude or longitude data; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> non contiene dati di longitudine o latitudine; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the latitude of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la latitudine del <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Latitude can range from -90.0 to 90.0.
trans-unit.target: Latitudine può variare da-90.0 a 90.0.

trans-unit.source: Latitude is measured in degrees north or south from the equator.
trans-unit.target: Latitudine viene misurata in gradi a nord o sud dall'equatore.

trans-unit.source: Positive values are north of the equator and negative values are south of the equator.
trans-unit.target: I valori positivi sono Nord dell'equatore e i valori negativi sono dall'equatore.

trans-unit.source: Latitude of the location.
trans-unit.target: Latitudine della posizione.

trans-unit.source: Latitude is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: Latitudine è compreso nell'intervallo valido.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the longitude of the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la longitudine del <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The longitude can range from -180.0 to 180.0.
trans-unit.target: La longitudine può variare da-180.0 e 180.0.

trans-unit.source: Longitude is measured in degrees east or west of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: Longitudine viene misurata in gradi a est o a ovest del primo meridiano.

trans-unit.source: Negative values are west of the prime meridian, and positive values are east of the prime meridian.
trans-unit.target: I valori negativi sono a ovest del primo meridiano e i valori positivi vengono est del meridiano.

trans-unit.source: The longitude.
trans-unit.target: La longitudine.

trans-unit.source: Longitude is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: Longitudine è compreso nell'intervallo valido.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects refer to the same location.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetti si riferiscono alla stessa posizione.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>oggetti hanno lo stesso <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>proprietà non vengono utilizzate per determinare l'equivalenza.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are determined to be equivalent; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> gli oggetti vengono considerati equivalenti; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether two <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects correspond to different locations.
trans-unit.target: Determina se due <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetti corrispondono a posizioni diverse.

trans-unit.source: Equivalent <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> objects have the same <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Equivalente <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>oggetti hanno lo stesso <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A>e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Longitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Latitude%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, and <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> properties are not used to determine equivalency.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>, <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A>, e <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A>proprietà non vengono utilizzate per determinare l'equivalenza.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.VerticalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.HorizontalAccuracy%2A> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.Altitude%2A>

trans-unit.source: The first <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il primo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: The second <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> to compare.
trans-unit.target: Il secondo <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> da confrontare.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, if the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> objects are determined to be different; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, se il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetti dipendono da diversi; in caso contrario, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta la velocità in metri al secondo.

trans-unit.source: The speed in meters per second.
trans-unit.target: La velocità in metri al secondo.

trans-unit.source: The speed must be greater than or equal to zero, or <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: La velocità deve essere maggiore o uguale a zero o <xref:System.Double>.</xref:System.Double>

trans-unit.source: Speed is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: Velocità è compreso nell'intervallo valido.

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Restituisce una stringa che contiene la latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: The string representation returned by this method is intended only for debugging use.
trans-unit.target: La rappresentazione di stringa restituita da questo metodo è destinata solo a scopo di debug.

trans-unit.source: This method does not return any locale-specific formatting for latitude and longitude.
trans-unit.target: Questo metodo non restituisce alcuna formattazione specifica delle impostazioni locali di latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the latitude and longitude, separated by a comma.
trans-unit.target: Stringa che contiene la latitudine e longitudine, separati da una virgola.

trans-unit.source: Represents a <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref> object that has unknown latitude and longitude fields.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta un <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref> oggetto sconosciuto nei campi latitudine e longitudine.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A> property can be used to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> contains no data.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A>proprietà può essere utilizzata per verificare se un <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>non contiene alcun dato.</xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> </xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate.IsUnknown%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the accuracy of the altitude given by the <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"></xref>, in meters.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene o imposta l'accuratezza dell'altitudine specificata per il <xref href="System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate"> </xref>, in metri.

trans-unit.source: The accuracy of the altitude, in meters.
trans-unit.target: L'accuratezza dell'altitudine, in metri.

trans-unit.source: VerticalAccuracy is set outside the valid range.
trans-unit.target: VerticalAccuracy è compreso nell'intervallo valido.
